root.name: Class of Heroes 2
root.description: OverviewClass of Heroes 2 is the second entry of the Class of Heroes series of dungeon crawling RPG published by Acquire and developed by Zerodiv.The game was released for the PlayStation Portable in Japan on June 25, 2009, while GaijinWorks MonkeyPaw have partnered to release Class of Heroes 2 in the west in 2013. The US digital release was originally scheduled for March 26, 2013 for PSN, with a limited pre-order only physical release to follow, however due to a rights issue with the opening theme both have been delayed until it is resolved.

similar_games.game: Etrian Odyssey II: Heroes of Lagaard
